dex.name: Stench
dex.desc: By releasing a stench when attacking, the Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

dex.name: Drizzle
dex.desc: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

dex.name: Speed Boost
dex.desc: The Pokémon's Speed stat is boosted every turn.

dex.name: Battle Armor
dex.desc: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

dex.name: Sturdy
dex.desc: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

dex.name: Damp
dex.desc: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.

dex.name: Limber
dex.desc: The Pokémon's limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.

dex.name: Sand Veil
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.

dex.name: Static
dex.desc: The Pokémon is charged with static electricity and may paralyze attackers that make direct contact with it.

dex.name: Volt Absorb
dex.desc: If hit by an Electric-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

dex.name: Water Absorb
dex.desc: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

dex.name: Oblivious
dex.desc: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

dex.name: Cloud Nine
dex.desc: Eliminates the effects of weather.

dex.name: Compound Eyes
dex.desc: The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

dex.name: Insomnia
dex.desc: The Pokémon's insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

dex.name: Color Change
dex.desc: The Pokémon's type becomes the type of the move used on it.

dex.name: Immunity
dex.desc: The Pokémon's immune system prevents it from being poisoned.

dex.name: Flash Fire
dex.desc: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves.

dex.name: Shield Dust
dex.desc: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.

dex.name: Own Tempo
dex.desc: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.

dex.name: Suction Cups
dex.desc: The Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot. This protects it from moves and items that would force it to switch out.

dex.name: Intimidate
dex.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

dex.name: Shadow Tag
dex.desc: The Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon's shadows to prevent them from fleeing or switching out.

dex.name: Rough Skin
dex.desc: The Pokémon's rough skin damages attackers that make direct contact with it.

dex.name: Wonder Guard
dex.desc: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

dex.name: Levitate
dex.desc: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

dex.name: Effect Spore
dex.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

dex.name: Synchronize
dex.desc: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.

dex.name: Clear Body
dex.desc: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

dex.name: Natural Cure
dex.desc: The Pokémon's status conditions are cured when it switches out.

dex.name: Lightning Rod
dex.desc: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.

dex.name: Serene Grace
dex.desc: Raises the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves.

dex.name: Swift Swim
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in rain.

dex.name: Chlorophyll
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

dex.name: Illuminate
dex.desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.

dex.name: Trace
dex.desc: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon's Ability.

dex.name: Huge Power
dex.desc: Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.

dex.name: Poison Point
dex.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

dex.name: Inner Focus
dex.desc: The Pokémon's intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

dex.name: Magma Armor
dex.desc: The Pokémon's hot magma coating prevents it from being frozen.

dex.name: Water Veil
dex.desc: The Pokémon's water veil prevents it from being burned.

dex.name: Magnet Pull
dex.desc: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from fleeing by pulling them in with magnetism.

dex.name: Soundproof
dex.desc: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

dex.name: Rain Dish
dex.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

dex.name: Sand Stream
dex.desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

dex.name: Pressure
dex.desc: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

dex.name: Thick Fat
dex.desc: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

dex.name: Early Bird
dex.desc: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

dex.name: Flame Body
dex.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

dex.name: Run Away
dex.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

dex.name: Keen Eye
dex.desc: The Pokémon's keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered.

dex.name: Hyper Cutter
dex.desc: The Pokémon's prized, mighty pincers prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

dex.name: Pickup
dex.desc: The Pokémon may pick up an item another Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.

dex.name: Truant
dex.desc: Each time the Pokémon uses a move, it spends the next turn loafing around.

dex.name: Hustle
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but lowers its accuracy.

dex.name: Cute Charm
dex.desc: The Pokémon may infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it.

dex.name: Plus
dex.desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

dex.name: Minus
dex.desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

dex.name: Forecast
dex.desc: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

dex.name: Sticky Hold
dex.desc: The Pokémon's held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

dex.name: Shed Skin
dex.desc: The Pokémon may cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

dex.name: Guts
dex.desc: It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.

dex.name: Marvel Scale
dex.desc: The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost its Defense stat if it has a status condition.

dex.name: Liquid Ooze
dex.desc: The strong stench of the Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.

dex.name: Overgrow
dex.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

dex.name: Blaze
dex.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

dex.name: Torrent
dex.desc: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

dex.name: Swarm
dex.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.

dex.name: Rock Head
dex.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

dex.name: Drought
dex.desc: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dex.name: Arena Trap
dex.desc: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing from battle.

dex.name: Vital Spirit
dex.desc: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

dex.name: White Smoke
dex.desc: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

dex.name: Pure Power
dex.desc: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

dex.name: Shell Armor
dex.desc: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

dex.name: Air Lock
dex.desc: Eliminates the effects of weather.

dex.name: Tangled Feet
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness if it is confused.

dex.name: Motor Drive
dex.desc: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Electric-type moves. Instead, its Speed stat is boosted.

dex.name: Rivalry
dex.desc: The Pokémon's competitive spirit makes it deal more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

dex.name: Steadfast
dex.desc: The Pokémon's determination boosts its Speed stat every time it flinches.

dex.name: Snow Cloak
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in snow.

dex.name: Gluttony
dex.desc: If the Pokémon is holding a Berry to be eaten when its HP is low, it will instead eat the Berry when its HP drops to half or less.

dex.name: Anger Point
dex.desc: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

dex.name: Unburden
dex.desc: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.

dex.name: Heatproof
dex.desc: The Pokémon's heatproof body halves the damage taken from Fire-type moves.

dex.name: Simple
dex.desc: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon's stat changes.

dex.name: Dry Skin
dex.desc: Restores the Pokémon's HP in rain or when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases the damage received from Fire-type moves.

dex.name: Download
dex.desc: The Pokémon compares an opposing Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.

dex.name: Iron Fist
dex.desc: Powers up punching moves.

dex.name: Poison Heal
dex.desc: If poisoned, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

dex.name: Adaptability
dex.desc: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

dex.name: Skill Link
dex.desc: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

dex.name: Hydration
dex.desc: Cures the Pokémon's status conditions in rain.

dex.name: Solar Power
dex.desc: In harsh sunlight, the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat is boosted, but its HP decreases every turn.

dex.name: Quick Feet
dex.desc: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.

dex.name: Normalize
dex.desc: All the Pokémon's moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

dex.name: Sniper
dex.desc: If the Pokémon's attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up even further.

dex.name: Magic Guard
dex.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

dex.name: No Guard
dex.desc: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

dex.name: Stall
dex.desc: The Pokémon is always the last to use its moves.

dex.name: Technician
dex.desc: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.

dex.name: Leaf Guard
dex.desc: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

dex.name: Klutz
dex.desc: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

dex.name: Mold Breaker
dex.desc: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

dex.name: Super Luck
dex.desc: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.

dex.name: Aftermath
dex.desc: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact.

dex.name: Anticipation
dex.desc: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.

dex.name: Forewarn
dex.desc: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

dex.name: Unaware
dex.desc: When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target's stat changes.

dex.name: Tinted Lens
dex.desc: The Pokémon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.

dex.name: Filter
dex.desc: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

dex.name: Slow Start
dex.desc: For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.

dex.name: Scrappy
dex.desc: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It is also unaffected by Intimidate.

dex.name: Storm Drain
dex.desc: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.

dex.name: Ice Body
dex.desc: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in snow.

dex.name: Solid Rock
dex.desc: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

dex.name: Snow Warning
dex.desc: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

dex.name: Honey Gather
dex.desc: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.

dex.name: Frisk
dex.desc: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.

dex.name: Reckless
dex.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

dex.name: Multitype
dex.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the plate it holds.

dex.name: Flower Gift
dex.desc: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of the Pokémon and its allies in harsh sunlight.

dex.name: Bad Dreams
dex.desc: Damages opposing Pokémon that are asleep.

dex.name: Pickpocket
dex.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item from attackers that make direct contact with it.

dex.name: Sheer Force
dex.desc: Removes any additional effects from the Pokémon's moves, but increases the moves' power.

dex.name: Contrary
dex.desc: Reverses any stat changes affecting the Pokémon so that attempts to boost its stats instead lower them— and attempts to lower its stats will boost them.

dex.name: Unnerve
dex.desc: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

dex.name: Defiant
dex.desc: If the Pokémon has any stat lowered by an opposing Pokémon, its Attack stat will be boosted sharply.

dex.name: Defeatist
dex.desc: Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP drops to half or less.

dex.name: Cursed Body
dex.desc: May disable a move that has dealt damage to the Pokémon.

dex.name: Healer
dex.desc: Sometimes cures the status conditions of the Pokémon's allies.

dex.name: Friend Guard
dex.desc: Reduces damage dealt to allies.

dex.name: Weak Armor
dex.desc: The Pokémon's Defense stat is lowered when it takes damage from physical moves, but its Speed stat is sharply boosted.

dex.name: Heavy Metal
dex.desc: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

dex.name: Light Metal
dex.desc: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

dex.name: Multiscale
dex.desc: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

dex.name: Toxic Boost
dex.desc: Powers up physical moves when the Pokémon is poisoned.

dex.name: Flare Boost
dex.desc: Powers up special moves when the Pokémon is burned.

dex.name: Harvest
dex.desc: May create another Berry after one is used.

dex.name: Telepathy
dex.desc: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.

dex.name: Moody
dex.desc: Every turn, one of the Pokémon's stats will be boosted sharply but another stat will be lowered.

dex.name: Overcoat
dex.desc: The Pokémon takes no damage from sandstorms. It is also protected from the effects of powders and spores.

dex.name: Poison Touch
dex.desc: May poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

dex.name: Regenerator
dex.desc: The Pokémon has a little of its HP restored when withdrawn from battle.

dex.name: Big Pecks
dex.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from having its Defense stat lowered.

dex.name: Sand Rush
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.

dex.name: Wonder Skin
dex.desc: Makes status moves more likely to miss the Pokémon.

dex.name: Analytic
dex.desc: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's move if it is the last to act that turn.

dex.name: Illusion
dex.desc: The Pokémon fools opponents by entering battle disguised as the last Pokémon in its Trainer's party.

dex.name: Imposter
dex.desc: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it's facing.

dex.name: Infiltrator
dex.desc: The Pokémon's moves are unaffected by the target's barriers, substitutes, and the like.

dex.name: Mummy
dex.desc: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Mummy.

dex.name: Moxie
dex.desc: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it shows moxie, which boosts its Attack stat.

dex.name: Justified
dex.desc: When the Pokémon is hit by a Dark-type attack, its Attack stat is boosted by its sense of justice.

dex.name: Rattled
dex.desc: The Pokémon gets scared when hit by a Dark-, Ghost-, or Bug-type attack or if intimidated, which boosts its Speed stat.

dex.name: Magic Bounce
dex.desc: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

dex.name: Sap Sipper
dex.desc: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Grass-type moves. Instead, its Attack stat is boosted.

dex.name: Prankster
dex.desc: Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.

dex.name: Sand Force
dex.desc: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.

dex.name: Iron Barbs
dex.desc: The Pokémon's iron barbs damage the attacker if it makes direct contact.

dex.name: Zen Mode
dex.desc: Changes the Pokémon's shape when its HP drops to half or less.

dex.name: Victory Star
dex.desc: Boosts the accuracy of the Pokémon and its allies.

dex.name: Turboblaze
dex.desc: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

dex.name: Teravolt
dex.desc: The Pokémon's moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

dex.name: Aroma Veil
dex.desc: Protects the Pokémon and its allies from effects that prevent the use of moves.

dex.name: Flower Veil
dex.desc: Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

dex.name: Cheek Pouch
dex.desc: The Pokémon's HP is restored when it eats any Berry, in addition to the Berry's usual effect.

dex.name: Protean
dex.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

dex.name: Fur Coat
dex.desc: Halves the damage from physical moves.

dex.name: Magician
dex.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item from any target it hits with a move.

dex.name: Bulletproof
dex.desc: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

dex.name: Competitive
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat sharply when its stats are lowered by an opposing Pokémon.

dex.name: Strong Jaw
dex.desc: The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.

dex.name: Refrigerate
dex.desc: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

dex.name: Sweet Veil
dex.desc: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep.

dex.name: Stance Change
dex.desc: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King's Shield.

dex.name: Gale Wings
dex.desc: Gives priority to the Pokémon's Flying-type moves while its HP is full.

dex.name: Mega Launcher
dex.desc: Powers up pulse moves.

dex.name: Grass Pelt
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.

dex.name: Symbiosis
dex.desc: The Pokémon passes its held item to an ally that has used up an item.

dex.name: Tough Claws
dex.desc: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

dex.name: Pixilate
dex.desc: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

dex.name: Gooey
dex.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

dex.name: Aerilate
dex.desc: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

dex.name: Parental Bond
dex.desc: The parent and child attack one after the other.

dex.name: Dark Aura
dex.desc: Powers up the Dark-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

dex.name: Fairy Aura
dex.desc: Powers up the Fairy-type moves of all Pokémon on the field.

dex.name: Aura Break
dex.desc: The effects of "Aura" Abilities are reversed to lower the power of affected moves.

dex.name: Primordial Sea
dex.desc: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

dex.name: Desolate Land
dex.desc: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

dex.name: Delta Stream
dex.desc: The Pokémon changes the weather so that no moves are supereffective against the Flying type.

dex.name: Stamina
dex.desc: Boosts the Defense stat when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

dex.name: Wimp Out
dex.desc: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

dex.name: Emergency Exit
dex.desc: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

dex.name: Water Compaction
dex.desc: Boosts the Defense stat sharply when the Pokémon is hit by a Water-type move.

dex.name: Merciless
dex.desc: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

dex.name: Shields Down
dex.desc: When its HP drops to half or less, the Pokémon's shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

dex.name: Stakeout
dex.desc: Doubles the damage dealt to a target that has just switched into battle.

dex.name: Water Bubble
dex.desc: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves that hit the Pokémon and prevents it from being burned.

dex.name: Steelworker
dex.desc: Powers up Steel-type moves.

dex.name: Berserk
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to drop to half or less.

dex.name: Slush Rush
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in snow.

dex.name: Long Reach
dex.desc: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

dex.name: Liquid Voice
dex.desc: Sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

dex.name: Triage
dex.desc: Gives priority to the Pokémon's healing moves.

dex.name: Galvanize
dex.desc: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

dex.name: Surge Surfer
dex.desc: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

dex.name: Schooling
dex.desc: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

dex.name: Disguise
dex.desc: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

dex.name: Battle Bond
dex.desc: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, its bond with its Trainer is strengthened, and its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats are boosted.

dex.name: Power Construct
dex.desc: Cells gather to aid the Pokémon when its HP drops to half or less, causing it to change into its Complete Forme.

dex.name: Corrosion
dex.desc: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

dex.name: Comatose
dex.desc: The Pokémon is always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack while in its sleeping state.

dex.name: Queenly Majesty
dex.desc: The Pokémon's majesty pressures opponents and makes them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

dex.name: Innards Out
dex.desc: When the Pokémon is knocked out, it damages its attacker by the amount equal to the HP it had left before it was hit.

dex.name: Dancer
dex.desc: Whenever a dance move is used in battle, the Pokémon will copy the user to immediately perform that dance move itself.

dex.name: Battery
dex.desc: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves.

dex.name: Fluffy
dex.desc: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

dex.name: Dazzling
dex.desc: The Pokémon dazzles its opponents, making them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

dex.name: Soul-Heart
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Sp. Atk stat every time another Pokémon faints.

dex.name: Tangling Hair
dex.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

dex.name: Receiver
dex.desc: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

dex.name: Power of Alchemy
dex.desc: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

dex.name: Beast Boost
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat every time it knocks out a target.

dex.name: RKS System
dex.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to match the memory disc it holds.

dex.name: Electric Surge
dex.desc: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dex.name: Psychic Surge
dex.desc: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dex.name: Misty Surge
dex.desc: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dex.name: Grassy Surge
dex.desc: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dex.name: Full Metal Body
dex.desc: Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.

dex.name: Shadow Shield
dex.desc: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

dex.name: Prism Armor
dex.desc: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks that hit the Pokémon.

dex.name: Neuroforce
dex.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's supereffective attacks even further.

dex.name: Intrepid Sword
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

dex.name: Dauntless Shield
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat the first time the Pokémon enters a battle.

dex.name: Libero
dex.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

dex.name: Ball Fetch
dex.desc: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

dex.name: Cotton Down
dex.desc: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stats of all Pokémon except itself.

dex.name: Propeller Tail
dex.desc: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

dex.name: Mirror Armor
dex.desc: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

dex.name: Gulp Missile
dex.desc: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

dex.name: Stalwart
dex.desc: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

dex.name: Steam Engine
dex.desc: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

dex.name: Punk Rock
dex.desc: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

dex.name: Sand Spit
dex.desc: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

dex.name: Ice Scales
dex.desc: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

dex.name: Ripen
dex.desc: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

dex.name: Ice Face
dex.desc: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.

dex.name: Power Spot
dex.desc: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

dex.name: Mimicry
dex.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.

dex.name: Screen Cleaner
dex.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

dex.name: Steely Spirit
dex.desc: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

dex.name: Perish Body
dex.desc: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

dex.name: Wandering Spirit
dex.desc: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

dex.name: Gorilla Tactics
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

dex.name: Neutralizing Gas
dex.desc: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

dex.name: Pastel Veil
dex.desc: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

dex.name: Hunger Switch
dex.desc: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.

dex.name: Quick Draw
dex.desc: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

dex.name: Unseen Fist
dex.desc: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

dex.name: Curious Medicine
dex.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

dex.name: Transistor
dex.desc: Powers up Electric-type moves.

dex.name: Dragon's Maw
dex.desc: Powers up Dragon-type moves.

dex.name: Chilling Neigh
dex.desc: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

dex.name: Grim Neigh
dex.desc: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

dex.name: As One
dex.desc: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh Ability.

dex.name: As One
dex.desc: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.

dex.name: Lingering Aroma
dex.desc: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

dex.name: Seed Sower
dex.desc: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

dex.name: Thermal Exchange
dex.desc: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

dex.name: Anger Shell
dex.desc: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

dex.name: Purifying Salt
dex.desc: The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

dex.name: Well-Baked Body
dex.desc: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

dex.name: Wind Rider
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

dex.name: Guard Dog
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

dex.name: Rocky Payload
dex.desc: Powers up Rock-type moves.

dex.name: Wind Power
dex.desc: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

dex.name: Zero to Hero
dex.desc: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

dex.name: Commander
dex.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

dex.name: Electromorphosis
dex.desc: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

dex.name: Protosynthesis
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

dex.name: Quark Drive
dex.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

dex.name: Good as Gold
dex.desc: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

dex.name: Vessel of Ruin
dex.desc: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

dex.name: Sword of Ruin
dex.desc: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

dex.name: Tablets of Ruin
dex.desc: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

dex.name: Beads of Ruin
dex.desc: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

dex.name: Orichalcum Pulse
dex.desc: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

dex.name: Hadron Engine
dex.desc: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

dex.name: Opportunist
dex.desc: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

dex.name: Cud Chew
dex.desc: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

dex.name: Sharpness
dex.desc: Powers up slicing moves.

dex.name: Supreme Overlord
dex.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

dex.name: Costar
dex.desc: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

dex.name: Toxic Debris
dex.desc: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

dex.name: Armor Tail
dex.desc: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

dex.name: Earth Eater
dex.desc: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

dex.name: Mycelium Might
dex.desc: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.
